Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the definition of medical debt
Summary: Relates to the definition of medical debt; clarifies that such debt must be related to health care services, products or devices provided to a person by a hospital.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-a, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.8373-A & A.9438)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the definition of medical debt
